 25 /*global Node, document, runtime, gui, ops, core */
 26 
 27 /**
 28  * @constructor
 29  * @struct
 30  */
 31 gui.SessionViewOptions = function () {
 32     "use strict";
 33 
 34     /**
 35      * Set the initial edit information marker visibility
 36      * @type {boolean}
 37      */
 38     this.editInfoMarkersInitiallyVisible = true;
 39 
 40     /**
 41      * Sets the initial visibility of the avatar
 42      * @type {boolean}
 43      */
 44     this.caretAvatarsInitiallyVisible = true;
 45 
 46     /**
 47      * Specify that the caret should blink if a non-collapsed range is selected
 48      * @type {boolean}
 49      */
 50     this.caretBlinksOnRangeSelect = true;
 51 };
 52 
 53 (function () {
 54     "use strict";
 55 
 56     /**
 57      * Return a user-specified option, or the default value if no user option
 58      * is provided
 59      * @param {boolean} userValue
 60      * @param {!boolean} defaultValue
 61      * @return {!boolean}
 62      */
 63     function configOption(userValue, defaultValue) {
 64         return userValue !== undefined ? Boolean(userValue) : defaultValue;
 65     }
 66 
 67     /**
 68      * TODO: We really don't want to let SessionView be aware of localMemberId,
 69      * so eventually we'll need to refactor this. It is only here so that the id can
 70      * be matched with the memberids for which CSS is generated, to generate the same CSS
 71      * for shadow cursors.
 72      * @constructor
 73      * @implements {core.Destroyable}
 74      * @param {!gui.SessionViewOptions} viewOptions
 75      * @param {string} localMemberId
 76      * @param {!ops.Session} session
 77      * @param {!gui.SessionConstraints} sessionConstraints
 78      * @param {!gui.CaretManager} caretManager
 79      * @param {!gui.SelectionViewManager} selectionViewManager
 80      */
 81     gui.SessionView = function SessionView(viewOptions, localMemberId, session, sessionConstraints, caretManager, selectionViewManager) {
 82         var /**@type{!HTMLStyleElement}*/
 83             avatarInfoStyles,
 84             /**@type{!HTMLStyleElement}*/
 85             annotationConstraintStyles,
 86             editInfons = 'urn:webodf:names:editinfo',
 87             /**@type{!Object.<string,!gui.EditInfoMarker>}*/
 88             editInfoMap = {},
 89             /**@type{!ops.OdtDocument}*/
 90             odtDocument,
 91             /**@type{!odf.OdfCanvas}*/
 92             odfCanvas,
 93             /**@type{!core.ScheduledTask}*/
 94             highlightRefreshTask,
 95             showEditInfoMarkers = configOption(viewOptions.editInfoMarkersInitiallyVisible, true),
 96             showCaretAvatars = configOption(viewOptions.caretAvatarsInitiallyVisible, true),
 97             blinkOnRangeSelect = configOption(viewOptions.caretBlinksOnRangeSelect, true);
 98 
 99         /**
100          * @return {!HTMLStyleElement}
101          */
102         function newStyleSheet() {
103             var head = document.getElementsByTagName('head').item(0),
104                 sheet = /**@type{!HTMLStyleElement}*/(document.createElement('style'));
105 
106             sheet.type = 'text/css';
107             sheet.media = 'screen, print, handheld, projection';
108             head.appendChild(sheet);
109 
110             return sheet;
111         }
112 
113         /**
114          * @param {!string} nodeName
115          * @param {!string} memberId
116          * @param {!string} pseudoClass
117          * @return {!string}
118          */
119         function createAvatarInfoNodeMatch(nodeName, memberId, pseudoClass) {
120             return nodeName + '[editinfo|memberid="' + memberId + '"]' + pseudoClass;
121         }
122 
123         /**
124          * @param {!string} nodeName
125          * @param {!string} memberId
126          * @param {string} pseudoClass
127          * @return {?Node}
128          */
129         function getAvatarInfoStyle(nodeName, memberId, pseudoClass) {
130             var node = avatarInfoStyles.firstChild,
131                 // adding "{" to make sure indexOf(nodeMatch) === 0 does not match longer selectors with same start
132                 nodeMatch = createAvatarInfoNodeMatch(nodeName, memberId, pseudoClass) + "{";
133 
134             while (node) {
135                 if (node.nodeType === Node.TEXT_NODE && /**@type{!Text}*/(node).data.indexOf(nodeMatch) === 0) {
136                     return node;
137                 }
138                 node = node.nextSibling;
139             }
140             return null;
141         }
142 
143         /**
144          * @param {!string} memberId
145          * @param {!string} name
146          * @param {!string} color
147          * @return {undefined}
148          */
149         function setAvatarInfoStyle(memberId, name, color) {
150             /**
151              * @param {!string} nodeName
152              * @param {!string} rule
153              * @param {!string} pseudoClass
154              */
155             function setStyle(nodeName, rule, pseudoClass) {
156                 var styleRule = createAvatarInfoNodeMatch(nodeName, memberId, pseudoClass) + rule,
157                     styleNode = getAvatarInfoStyle(nodeName, memberId, pseudoClass);
158 
159                 // TODO: this does not work with Firefox 16.0.1, throws a HierarchyRequestError on first try.
160                 // And Chromium a "SYNTAX_ERR: DOM Exception 12" now
161                 // avatarEditedStyles.sheet.insertRule(paragraphStyleName+styleRuleRudimentCStr, 0);
162                 // Workaround for now:
163                 if (styleNode) {
164                     styleNode.data = styleRule;
165                 } else {
166                     avatarInfoStyles.appendChild(document.createTextNode(styleRule));
167                 }
168             }
169             // WARNING: nodeMatch relies on that there is no space before the starting "{"
170             setStyle('div.editInfoMarker', '{ background-color: ' + color + '; }', '');
171             setStyle('span.editInfoColor', '{ background-color: ' + color + '; }', '');
172             setStyle('span.editInfoAuthor', '{ content: "' + name + '"; }', ':before');
173             setStyle('dc|creator', '{ background-color: ' + color + '; }', '');
174             setStyle('.webodf-selectionOverlay', '{ fill: ' + color + '; stroke: ' + color + ';}', '');
175             if (memberId === localMemberId) {
176                 // Show selection handles for local user
177                 setStyle('.webodf-touchEnabled .webodf-selectionOverlay', '{ display: block; }', ' > .webodf-draggable');
178 
179                 // Also set shadow cursor rules for local user
180                 memberId = gui.ShadowCursor.ShadowCursorMemberId;
181                 setStyle('.webodf-selectionOverlay', '{ fill: ' + color + '; stroke: ' + color + ';}', '');
182                 setStyle('.webodf-touchEnabled .webodf-selectionOverlay', '{ display: block; }', ' > .webodf-draggable');
183             }
184         }
185 
186         /**
187          * @param {!Element} element
188          * @param {!string} memberId
189          * @param {!number} timestamp
190          * @return {undefined}
191          */
192         function highlightEdit(element, memberId, timestamp) {
193             var editInfo,
194                 editInfoMarker,
195                 id = '',
196                 editInfoNode = element.getElementsByTagNameNS(editInfons, 'editinfo').item(0);
197 
198             if (editInfoNode) {
199                 id = /**@type{!Element}*/(editInfoNode).getAttributeNS(editInfons, 'id');
200                 editInfoMarker = editInfoMap[id];
201             } else {
202                 id = Math.random().toString();
203                 editInfo = new ops.EditInfo(element, session.getOdtDocument());
204                 editInfoMarker = new gui.EditInfoMarker(editInfo, showEditInfoMarkers);
205 
206                 editInfoNode = /**@type{!Element}*/(element.getElementsByTagNameNS(editInfons, 'editinfo').item(0));
207                 editInfoNode.setAttributeNS(editInfons, 'id', id);
208                 editInfoMap[id] = editInfoMarker;
209             }
210 
211             editInfoMarker.addEdit(memberId, new Date(timestamp));
212         }
213 
214         /**
215          * Updates the visibility on all existing editInfo entries
216          * @param {!boolean} visible
217          * @return {undefined}
218          */
219         function setEditInfoMarkerVisibility(visible) {
220             var editInfoMarker,
221                 /**@type{string}*/
222                 keyname;
223 
224             for (keyname in editInfoMap) {
225                 if (editInfoMap.hasOwnProperty(keyname)) {
226                     editInfoMarker = editInfoMap[keyname];
227                     if (visible) {
228                         editInfoMarker.show();
229                     } else {
230                         editInfoMarker.hide();
231                     }
232                 }
233             }
234         }
235 
236         /**
237          * Updates the visibility on all existing avatars
238          * @param {!boolean} visible
239          * @return {undefined}
240          */
241         function setCaretAvatarVisibility(visible) {
242             caretManager.getCarets().forEach(function (caret) {
243                 if (visible) {
244                     caret.showHandle();
245                 } else {
246                     caret.hideHandle();
247                 }
248             });
249         }
250 
251         /**
252          * Show edit information markers displayed near edited paragraphs
253          * @return {undefined}
254          */
255         this.showEditInfoMarkers = function () {
256             if (showEditInfoMarkers) {
257                 return;
258             }
259 
260             showEditInfoMarkers = true;
261             setEditInfoMarkerVisibility(showEditInfoMarkers);
262         };
263 
264         /**
265          * Hide edit information markers displayed near edited paragraphs
266          * @return {undefined}
267          */
268         this.hideEditInfoMarkers = function () {
269             if (!showEditInfoMarkers) {
270                 return;
271             }
272 
273             showEditInfoMarkers = false;
274             setEditInfoMarkerVisibility(showEditInfoMarkers);
275         };
276 
277         /**
278          * Show member avatars above the cursor
279          * @return {undefined}
280          */
281         this.showCaretAvatars = function () {
282             if (showCaretAvatars) {
283                 return;
284             }
285 
286             showCaretAvatars = true;
287             setCaretAvatarVisibility(showCaretAvatars);
288         };
289 
290         /**
291          * Hide member avatars above the cursor
292          * @return {undefined}
293          */
294         this.hideCaretAvatars = function () {
295             if (!showCaretAvatars) {
296                 return;
297             }
298 
299             showCaretAvatars = false;
300             setCaretAvatarVisibility(showCaretAvatars);
301         };
302 
303         /**
304          * @return {!ops.Session}
305          */
306         this.getSession = function () {
307             return session;
308         };
309         /**
310          * @param {!string} memberid
311          * @return {?gui.Caret}
312          */
313         this.getCaret = function (memberid) {
314             return caretManager.getCaret(memberid);
315         };
316 
317         /**
318          * @param {!ops.Member} member
319          * @return {undefined}
320          */
321         function renderMemberData(member) {
322             var memberId = member.getMemberId(),
323                 properties = member.getProperties();
324 
325             setAvatarInfoStyle(memberId, properties.fullName, properties.color);
326         }
327 
328         /**
329          * @param {!ops.OdtCursor} cursor
330          * @return {undefined}
331          */
332         function onCursorAdded(cursor) {
333             var memberId = cursor.getMemberId(),
334                 properties = session.getOdtDocument().getMember(memberId).getProperties(),
335                 caret;
336 
337             caretManager.registerCursor(cursor, showCaretAvatars, blinkOnRangeSelect);
338             selectionViewManager.registerCursor(cursor, true);
339 
340             caret = caretManager.getCaret(memberId);
341             if (caret) {
342                 caret.setAvatarImageUrl(properties.imageUrl);
343                 caret.setColor(properties.color);
344             }
345             runtime.log("+++ View here +++ eagerly created an Caret for '" + memberId + "'! +++");
346         }
347 
348         /**
349          * @param {!ops.OdtCursor} cursor
350          * @return {undefined}
351          */
352         function onCursorMoved(cursor) {
353             var memberId = cursor.getMemberId(),
354                 localSelectionView = selectionViewManager.getSelectionView(localMemberId),
355                 shadowSelectionView = selectionViewManager.getSelectionView(gui.ShadowCursor.ShadowCursorMemberId),
356                 localCaret = caretManager.getCaret(localMemberId);
357 
358             if (memberId === localMemberId) {
359                 // If our actual cursor moved, then hide the shadow cursor's selection
360                 shadowSelectionView.hide();
361                 if (localSelectionView) {
362                     localSelectionView.show();
363                 }
364                 if (localCaret) {
365                     localCaret.show();
366                 }
367             } else if (memberId === gui.ShadowCursor.ShadowCursorMemberId) {
368                 // If the shadow cursor moved, then hide the current cursor's selection
369                 shadowSelectionView.show();
370                 if (localSelectionView) {
371                     localSelectionView.hide();
372                 }
373                 if (localCaret) {
374                     localCaret.hide();
375                 }
376             }
377         }
378 
379         /**
380          * @param {!string} memberid
381          * @return {undefined}
382          */
383         function onCursorRemoved(memberid) {
384             selectionViewManager.removeSelectionView(memberid);
385         }
386 
387         /**
388          * @param {!{paragraphElement:!Element,memberId:string,timeStamp:number}} info
389          * @return {undefined}
390          */
391         function onParagraphChanged(info) {
392             highlightEdit(info.paragraphElement, info.memberId, info.timeStamp);
393             highlightRefreshTask.trigger();
394         }
395 
396         /**
397          * @return {undefined}
398          */
399         function refreshHighlights() {
400             var annotationViewManager = odfCanvas.getAnnotationViewManager();
401             if (annotationViewManager) {
402                 annotationViewManager.rehighlightAnnotations();
403                 odtDocument.fixCursorPositions();
404             }
405         }
406 
407         function processConstraints() {
408             var localMemberName,
409                 cssString,
410                 localMember;
411 
412             // TODO: Move such handling into AnnotationViewManager
413             if (annotationConstraintStyles.innerHTML !== "") {
414                 annotationConstraintStyles.innerHTML = "";
415             }
416 
417             if (sessionConstraints.getState(gui.CommonConstraints.EDIT.ANNOTATIONS.ONLY_DELETE_OWN) === true) {
418                 localMember = session.getOdtDocument().getMember(localMemberId);
419                 if (localMember) {
420                     localMemberName = localMember.getProperties().fullName;
421                     cssString = ".annotationWrapper:not([creator = '" + localMemberName + "']) .annotationRemoveButton { display: none; }";
422                     annotationConstraintStyles.appendChild(document.createTextNode(cssString));
423                 }
424             }
425         }
426 
427         /**
428          * @param {!function(!Error=)} callback
429          * @return {undefined}
430          */
431         function destroy(callback) {
432             var /**@type{!Array.<!gui.EditInfoMarker>}*/
433                 editInfoArray = Object.keys(editInfoMap).map(function (keyname) {
434                     return editInfoMap[keyname];
435                 });
436 
437             odtDocument.unsubscribe(ops.Document.signalMemberAdded, renderMemberData);
438             odtDocument.unsubscribe(ops.Document.signalMemberUpdated, renderMemberData);
439             odtDocument.unsubscribe(ops.Document.signalCursorAdded, onCursorAdded);
440             odtDocument.unsubscribe(ops.Document.signalCursorRemoved, onCursorRemoved);
441             odtDocument.unsubscribe(ops.OdtDocument.signalParagraphChanged, onParagraphChanged);
442             odtDocument.unsubscribe(ops.Document.signalCursorMoved, onCursorMoved);
443 
444             odtDocument.unsubscribe(ops.OdtDocument.signalParagraphChanged, selectionViewManager.rerenderSelectionViews);
445             odtDocument.unsubscribe(ops.OdtDocument.signalTableAdded, selectionViewManager.rerenderSelectionViews);
446             odtDocument.unsubscribe(ops.OdtDocument.signalParagraphStyleModified, selectionViewManager.rerenderSelectionViews);
447 
448             sessionConstraints.unsubscribe(gui.CommonConstraints.EDIT.ANNOTATIONS.ONLY_DELETE_OWN, processConstraints);
449             odtDocument.unsubscribe(ops.Document.signalMemberAdded, processConstraints);
450             odtDocument.unsubscribe(ops.Document.signalMemberUpdated, processConstraints);
451 
452             avatarInfoStyles.parentNode.removeChild(avatarInfoStyles);
453             annotationConstraintStyles.parentNode.removeChild(annotationConstraintStyles);
454 
455             (function destroyEditInfo(i, err) {
456                 if (err) {
457                     callback(err);
458                 } else {
459                     if (i < editInfoArray.length) {
460                         editInfoArray[i].destroy(function (err) {
461                             destroyEditInfo(i + 1, err);
462                         });
463                     } else {
464                         callback();
465                     }
466                 }
467             }(0, undefined));
468         }
469 
470         /**
471          * @param {!function(!Error=)} callback, passing an error object in case of error
472          * @return {undefined}
473          */
474         this.destroy = function (callback) {
475             var cleanup = [highlightRefreshTask.destroy, destroy];
476             core.Async.destroyAll(cleanup, callback);
477         };
478 
479         function init() {
480             odtDocument = session.getOdtDocument();
481             odfCanvas = odtDocument.getOdfCanvas();
482 
483             odtDocument.subscribe(ops.Document.signalMemberAdded, renderMemberData);
484             odtDocument.subscribe(ops.Document.signalMemberUpdated, renderMemberData);
485             odtDocument.subscribe(ops.Document.signalCursorAdded, onCursorAdded);
486             odtDocument.subscribe(ops.Document.signalCursorRemoved, onCursorRemoved);
487             odtDocument.subscribe(ops.OdtDocument.signalParagraphChanged, onParagraphChanged);
488             odtDocument.subscribe(ops.Document.signalCursorMoved, onCursorMoved);
489 
490             odtDocument.subscribe(ops.OdtDocument.signalParagraphChanged, selectionViewManager.rerenderSelectionViews);
491             odtDocument.subscribe(ops.OdtDocument.signalTableAdded, selectionViewManager.rerenderSelectionViews);
492             odtDocument.subscribe(ops.OdtDocument.signalParagraphStyleModified, selectionViewManager.rerenderSelectionViews);
493 
494             sessionConstraints.subscribe(gui.CommonConstraints.EDIT.ANNOTATIONS.ONLY_DELETE_OWN, processConstraints);
495             odtDocument.subscribe(ops.Document.signalMemberAdded, processConstraints);
496             odtDocument.subscribe(ops.Document.signalMemberUpdated, processConstraints);
497 
498             // Add a css sheet for user info-edited styling
499             avatarInfoStyles = newStyleSheet();
500             avatarInfoStyles.appendChild(document.createTextNode('@namespace editinfo url(urn:webodf:names:editinfo);'));
501             avatarInfoStyles.appendChild(document.createTextNode('@namespace dc url(http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/);'));
502             // Add a css sheet for annotation constraint styling
503             annotationConstraintStyles = newStyleSheet();
504             processConstraints();
505 
506             highlightRefreshTask = core.Task.createRedrawTask(refreshHighlights);
507         }
508         init();
509     };
510 }());
511
